item.title: CVE-2024-22283|2024-01-26T23:11:52.228Z -- Delhivery -- Delhivery Logistics Courier
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Delhivery Delhivery Logistics Courier.This issue affects Delhivery Logistics Courier: from n/a through 1.0.107.
